title: Digital
objectives: You will learn this course Verilog HDL which used to design in addition to some verification techniques such as coverage & assertions.
requirements: 1. Basic understanding of computer programming concepts
2. Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
3. A computer with internet access and a modern web browser
4. A code editor such as Visual Studio Code or Sublime Text
5. Optional: familiarity with a version control system such as Git
